name: ChatGPT
shortDescription: AI chatbot by OpenAI for conversation and text generation.
longDescription: ChatGPT is a conversational AI model developed by OpenAI. It is capable of generating human-like text, answering questions, helping with writing, coding, brainstorming, research, and more. Known for its accuracy, reasoning ability, and versatility, ChatGPT is widely used in education, work, and personal tasks.

name: Claude AI
shortDescription: AI assistant from Anthropic known for safety and long context.
longDescription: Claude is an AI assistant built by Anthropic with a focus on safety, reasoning, and long-context understanding. It excels in summarizing large documents, research tasks, and deep conversations while maintaining safe output.

name: Google Gemini
shortDescription: Google’s multimodal AI for chat, creation, and reasoning.
longDescription: Gemini is Google's powerful multimodal AI model capable of understanding text, images, audio, and video. It is integrated into Google Workspace and Android, making it an everyday productivity assistant.

name: Perplexity AI
shortDescription: AI-powered search engine with real-time citations.
longDescription: Perplexity is an AI search engine that provides real-time answers with citations, combining large language models with search results. Popular for research and fact-checking.

name: Midjourney
shortDescription: High-quality AI image generator used by professionals.
longDescription: Midjourney is a leading AI image generator known for artistic, cinematic, and photorealistic visuals. It operates through Discord and is widely used for creative production.

name: Leonardo AI
shortDescription: AI platform for images, textures, and concept art.
longDescription: Leonardo AI allows designers to generate game assets, concept art, and textures with high control. It includes training, workflows, and asset libraries.

name: Runway ML
shortDescription: AI video generation and editing tool.
longDescription: Runway ML enables video creation, editing, and effects using AI models. Known for Gen-1 and Gen-2 video generation.

name: ElevenLabs
shortDescription: AI tool for realistic voices and voice cloning.
longDescription: ElevenLabs generates extremely realistic AI voices, supports multi-language output, and has voice cloning capabilities.

name: Synthesia
shortDescription: AI video creation with avatars and voiceovers.
longDescription: Synthesia allows anyone to create professional videos using AI avatars without needing cameras or actors. Used by companies for training and marketing.

name: Canva AI
shortDescription: AI design suite with templates, images, and editing tools.
longDescription: Canva AI enhances design workflows with Magic Write, Magic Design, AI-generated images, and automated editing tools to create professional graphics quickly.

name: Jasper AI
shortDescription: AI copywriting and marketing content generator.
longDescription: Jasper AI is a powerful AI content generator designed for marketers, writers, and business owners. It can generate blog posts, social media copy, ads, emails, and more with high-quality, human-like output.

name: Copy.ai
shortDescription: AI tool for generating marketing copy and emails.
longDescription: Copy.ai provides AI-assisted content creation for businesses and marketers. It can generate emails, ads, blog posts, product descriptions, and social media content quickly and efficiently.

name: Grammarly
shortDescription: AI-powered grammar checker and writing assistant.
longDescription: Grammarly is an AI writing assistant that checks grammar, spelling, punctuation, tone, and style. It works in emails, documents, social media posts, and more, helping users communicate clearly and professionally.

name: Notion AI
shortDescription: AI-powered productivity assistant inside Notion.
longDescription: Notion AI enhances the Notion workspace with AI-powered suggestions, summarization, writing assistance, and idea generation, helping teams and individuals stay productive and organized.

name: Tome
shortDescription: AI storytelling and presentation creation tool.
longDescription: Tome AI allows users to create interactive presentations, stories, and decks using AI-powered generation. It helps automate slide creation and storytelling for business, education, and content marketing.

name: Runway Video AI
shortDescription: AI video editing and generation platform for creators.
longDescription: Runway Video AI allows creators to generate and edit videos using AI, including green-screen removal, motion tracking, and style transfer. It’s widely used in content creation and marketing.

name: ElevenLabs
shortDescription: AI voice generation and cloning tool.
longDescription: ElevenLabs allows creators to generate realistic AI voices for audiobooks, dubbing, podcasts, and other applications. It supports multiple languages and custom voice cloning.

name: Synthesia
shortDescription: AI video creation with avatars and voiceovers.
longDescription: Synthesia is a no-camera video creation platform where users can create professional videos using AI avatars and voiceovers. Popular for corporate training and marketing.

name: Canva AI
shortDescription: AI design suite for images, templates, and creative content.
longDescription: Canva AI integrates AI tools into Canva for easy design creation, including text-to-image generation, Magic Write for copy, and automated design suggestions.

name: Figma AI
shortDescription: AI assistant integrated into Figma for design workflows.
longDescription: Figma AI helps designers by generating design suggestions, automating repetitive tasks, and enhancing creativity within Figma projects.
